recipesJson.name: Blue Raspberry dum dum
recipesJson.author: art228
recipesJson.description: a bright, hard candy blue raspberry lollipop. If you are into hard candy type flavors and love blue raspberry, than this will be a great vape for you! Please leave a review if You mix it up. Taste identical to the candy imo. Good off the shake but better after just 1-2 days.

reviews.text: The throat hit is heavy on this. I'd swap the marshmallows for tfa whipped cream as it only seems to be here for mouthfeel.  Tfa raspberry (not the sweet version) is way better imo for this mix.
I don't know of one fan of FW's Hard Candy. If you want suggestions on maybe subbing that let me know.
I'm personally not the biggest fan of FW Hard Candy, but I was curious anyways. Not too shabby off a shake. Pretty accurate representation though already. Nice one.
